description:
If you prefer a 2 piece swimsuit for your training, this top pairs well with your favourite bottoms.

  • Recycled nylon blend has plenty of stretch and dries quickly
  • Chlorine resistant fabric holds its chape and colour better than most swimwear fabrics
  • Adjustable straps let you find the right amount of support
  • Removeable cups
name: Speedo Quantum Fusion Bikini Top - Women's
